price: 38. Toen Wij jouw moeder inspireerden met dat wat Wij inspireerden.
arabic: إِذۡ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: idh awḥaynā ilā ummika mā yūḥā
